meanings.definition: The quality or state of being stocky.
meanings.sent1: Her stockinesses made her a strong wrestler.
meanings.sent2: The boxer's stockinesses helped him withstand his opponent's punches.
meanings.sent3: The stockinesses of the tree stump made it impossible to move.
meanings.sent4: The stockinesses of the old building gave it a sense of permanence.
meanings.sent5: The stockinesses of the bear made it look formidable in the wild.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a thick, sturdy build.
meanings.sent1: The stockinesses of the oak tree made it stand out in the forest.
meanings.sent2: His stockinesses made him a perfect fit for the offensive line in football.
meanings.sent3: The stockinesses of the bulldog made it a comical sight when it tried to run.
meanings.sent4: The stockinesses of the mountain symbolized strength and resilience.
meanings.sent5: The stockinesses of the bouncer made him an imposing figure at the club entrance.
